category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_task_assignee_dynamic_participant_sync
preference.preference_description: Controls synchronization between a Task Assignee and Dynamic Participants of a Task's target object. When such synchronization is enabled, task reassignment will result in the reassignment of Dynamic Participants of the Task's target object, and vice versa. This synchronization behavior is possible only when the initial task assignment is based on a Dynamic Participant of the Task's target object. Valid Values: * true: Task assignments are synchronized with assignment of Dynamic Participants on the Task's target object. This is the default value. * false: Task assignments are not synchronized with assignment of Dynamic Participants on the Task's target object.
